name: Missing William
description:
Alicia is the victim of a car accident. One day she was driving with her child, the 5-year-old William and another driver crashed into them. Alicia survived the accident, though she suffers from severe head trauma. William unfortunately died. Now Alicia has a problem: she thinks she is someone else every day and she relieves William’s death all over again.

Trigger warnings: ptsd, death of a child

Writing: Anna Kończak (Lavinnia)

Proofreading: Iam Pace

Art: LilDevilDesi

Programming: buhnuhnah

Music: Lucas Gaudie-Ley

Voice actors:

  • Shakyra Dunn as William
  • Michelle Lee as Alicia
  • Josh Portillo as Doctor, Human Man
  • Elizabeth Ryan as Human Woman, Alicia's Mother
